CustomRewardForAngel.Description: Replaces the redundant perma-Holy-Aura effect with a more thematic perk - bit of cold weapon damage, natural armor and cold resist. Perks are comparable to the level 5 Geniekind as opposed to the level 8 Holy Aura. Select this to only do the replacement for Angel. Requires Reward Feature Conversion for Dawn Of Dragons to be active

CustomRewardForEveryone.Description: Do the replacement for everyone, not just Angel. Supercedes custom reward for angel.

MonsterSlayers.Description: Makes Ready For Anything training decree from one outcome of Crusade Event 54: Monster Slayers permanent rather than a one off 60-day buff.

LocalProduction.Description: All outcomes of Local Production Act 5 Crusade event now are perma-buffs rather than repeatable decrees, because you shouldn't have to constantly re-set-up local production

DragonheirScionArcaneStrikeScaling.Description: Arcane Strike scales with DHS plus Dragon Disciple level if that's better than max caster level
